com.soa.auth.credential
Class BinaryTokenCredential

java.lang.Object
  com.soa.auth.credential.BinaryTokenCredential
Direct Known Subclasses:
SSOTokenCredential
public class BinaryTokenCredential
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an arbitrary customized credential objects that can be put into a Subject's public credential set. This credential can be also directly serialized into WS-Security Binary Security Token.
